Text:
I made the subs myself, because they were not available. Worked for 4 days on it :S

The dvd is not for sale any where in Holland (and certainly not with dutch subs)

If you like the results,  let me know right here.. If you don´t like it, let me know as well.

Sure hope you like it :)

greetz,

ZeNiTH_NL
bij instelling kan je je berichten lezen
Beste seeder, wil je svp nog even seeden? Als ik hem compleet heb laat ik hem nog wel even open staan voor andere leechers. Nu blijf ik hangen op 93,7 %... Thnx!

Hey,
Ik ben aan t seeden (22.34).. 
Ik blijf de komende maanden nog wel seeden. Iedere dag zet ik mijn pc wel een paar uur aan, dus iedereen met geduld krijgt alles wel binnen :)

Groeten ZeNiTH_NL

Request: more seeders. 
Almost all of you immediately delete it after downloading... I cant upload 4.11 Gb to hundreds of people :S 
If you can affort it, please seed

Il n y a pas de sous-titrage en français. 
Tu doit débrancher le sous-titrage hollandais avec la télécommande.

Stopped seeding this one on the 2nd of februari 2007. 


If you still cant get it in after a long wait, and really want it, contact me on tpb!
unbelievable, got 99.8% and the last seeder stopt seeding... Please! help me out
Sorry dude, can´t imagine you are still waiting for someone to upload :) Did you get it completely? Let me know if you didnt (right here)
Pleas, can someone help me and seed it a little bit longer. Iäve got 83,2% and it won't get any longer. Pleas help!!!
Please, please, please please can you start re-seeding this someone? At 92.37% and stuck... I wish I could buy this somewhere legally but it's not on sale ANYWHERE... :-(

Okay.. I will reseed this one more time...
Please seed for a while after you have it okay? Its lots of work to keep reseeding.

friendly greetings,
ZeNiTH_NL

I tried to download this movie several times, but it ALWAYS gets stuck at 92,3%, does anyone know how to solve this? Does anyone have the complete movie? It's not for sale in The Netherlands, and I really would love to have and see it!
Many thanks in advance for your help!
Hey, could you reseed this, please?  I'd like to take a crack at making English subs for it.
Hey, could you reseed this, a few of us are really wanting to watch this movie. I can seed after.
